rgb_hsl.palette

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • rgb_hsl.palette.Palette
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalogousPalette, ComplementaryPalette, MonoChromaticPalette

    public abstract class Palette
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass used as a base class for creating different types of Palettes. Palettes are based on abstractions in color theory. More information can be found here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_theory
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Noah Teshima

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Palette()
      Default constructor.
      Palette(Color color)
      Create a color palette with respect to the given Color reference.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Palette

        public Palette()
        Default constructor. When invoked, the color palette is instantiated with respect to the origin in HSL space.

      • Palette

        public Palette(Color color)
        Create a color palette with respect to the given Color reference.
        Parameters:
        color - Color reference containing the color with respect to which the palette should generate.

    • Method Detail

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String file)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Write the given colors out to the specified file in HSL space.
        Parameters:
        file - String reference containing the name of the file to write to. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given file is a directory, preventing the ability to be overwritten.

      • getColors

        public java.util.List<Color> getColors()
        Get a shallow copy of all the colors in the current palette.
        Returns:
        List of basetype Color containing all of the colors in the current palette.

      • getStartingColor

        public Color getStartingColor()
        Get the starting color of the palette.
        Returns:
        Color object that the palette is based around.

      • getColor

        public Color getColor(int index)
        Get a shallow copy of the Color at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - integer value containing the Color object to return
        Returns:
        Color object corresponding to the specified index.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get the number of Colors being used in the palette.
        Returns:
        integer value containing the number of Colors being used in the palette.
